location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There is an index at the end of the file (folios 47-50). The index is arranged chronologically and refers to documents within the file; it gives brief description of the correspondence with a reference number in red or blue crayon, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

The main foliation starts on the front cover of the file, in pencil in circled numbers in the top right corner of recto, and continues to 51, which is the last number given to the back cover of the file. There is an additional foliation sequence in pencil in top right corner, starting on folio 1 (numbered 20) and continuing to 33.

mods.abstract: The file contains letters of accompaniment and notifications of receipt of the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) annual report.There is an index at the end of the file (folios 47-50).

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Ḥamad bin 'Īsá Āl Khalīfah
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah
King of Saudi Arabia Sa'ūd bin 'Abd al-'Azīz Āl Sa'ūd
